name: Ted Sidecar
description: Registers /ted commands that call the local Ted Engine sidecar with strict loopback and path allowlist guards.

baseUrl.label: Ted Sidecar Base URL

timeoutMs.label: Timeout (ms)
timeoutMs.help: HTTP timeout for /ted doctor and /ted status requests.
